PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 35-year-old white woman living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. with a high school diploma, sarah works a steady job that provides her with a middle-class income between $90,000 and $100,000 annually.

sarah was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen. she identifies as a protestant christian, although she seldom attends religious services. politically, sarah aligns herself with the republican party and holds conservative views.

in her personal life, sarah is currently separated from her spouse. she is an avid internet user, frequently browsing online almost constantly. despite her busy schedule, sarah finds time to engage in volunteer work, giving back to her community.

sarah takes her civic responsibilities seriously and is absolutely certain that she is registered to vote at her current address. she stays informed on current events and political issues, and her conservative republican views influence her voting decisions.

while sarah may not have pursued higher education, she is a hardworking individual who has achieved financial stability through her career. her frequent internet usage and volunteerism suggest an active and engaged lifestyle beyond her professional commitments.
